module.name: hipay_professional
module.description: Moduł HiPay umożliwia obsługę transakcji online bez konieczności zawierania umowy z agentem rozliczeniowym i posiada system ochrony przed oszustwami
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Moduł HiPay umożliwia obsługę transakcji online bez konieczności zawierania umowy z agentem rozliczeniowym i posiada system ochrony przed oszustwami. Moduł zapewnia dostęp do wszelkich krajowych i międzynarodowych form płatności (Visa, Mastercard, ING, Bancontact Mistercash, Sofort, Payshop, Boleto bancario, Ideal, Sisal...)

module.name: skrill
module.description: Skrill, który cieszy się zaufaniem milionów osób na całym świecie, wychodzi naprzeciw potrzebom ponad 156 000 firm, oferując wygodny i bezpieczny sposób wysyłania oraz otrz
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Skrill, który cieszy się zaufaniem milionów osób na całym świecie, wychodzi naprzeciw potrzebom ponad 156 000 firm, oferując wygodny i bezpieczny sposób wysyłania oraz otrzymywania pieniędzy w niemal 200 krajach i 40 walutach.
module.additional_description: Bezpłatna i szybka konfiguracjaDostęp do ponad 100 lokalnych rozwiązań płatniczych w ramach 1 łatwej integracjiŁączność z ponad 30 milionami posiadaczy rachunku SkrillNajwyższe standardy bezpieczeństwa i technologia zapobiegająca nadużyciom finansowymPłynny sposób realizacji płatności za pomocą telefonu komórkowego, tabletu i komputera

module.name: paypal
module.description: Umil życie Twoim klientom oferując im jedno z najlepszych rozwiązań do obsługi płatności. System PayPal to ponad 143 miliony kont użytkowników na całym świecie
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Umil życie Twoim klientom oferując im jedno z najlepszych rozwiązań do obsługi płatności. System PayPal to ponad 143 miliony kont użytkowników na całym świecie. Jest liderem w dziedzinie obsługi płatności online i z telefonów komórkowych. System jest oferowany w 193 krajach i obsługuje 26 walut. Jest to również najbardziej rozpoznawalne i cieszące się największym zaufaniem klientów rozwiązanie do obsługi płatności online. Moduł 1.7 będzie dostępny najpóźniej w marcu 2017, wkrótce więcej informacji

module.name: prestafraud
module.description: Protect your store from fraudulent payments
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Protect your store from fraudulent payments

module.name: autoupgrade
module.description: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method. By running the most recent version of PrestaShop, you will benefit from the latest features and improvements available. For this reason (and for your shop security) it is always recommended to use an up-to-date version.
module.additional_description: The easiest way to upgrade your PrestaShop store!

module.description: Zostań ekspertem e-commerce w mgnieniu oka!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Zostań ekspertem e-commerce w mgnieniu oka!

module.name: gadwords
module.description: Pokaż swój do Do ludzi w tym samym momencie, gdy szukają tego, co oferujesz
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Pokaż swój do Do ludzi w tym samym momencie, gdy szukają tego, co oferujesz. Google i PrestaShop Zwiększenie inwestycji w reklamę poprzez oferowanie € 75 po raz pierwszy spędził € 25!  Pobierz moduł, aby uzyskać kod promocyjny i rozpocząć kampanię teraz!
module.additional_description: Zacznij wyświetlać reklamy w Google Przedstaw swoją ofertę klientom dokładnie w momencie, w którym szukają jej w Google. Zapłacisz tylko wtedy, gdy klikną reklamę i odwiedzą stronę Twojej firmy. Bezpłatna pomoc telefoniczna: 800 253 500

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: SendinBlue: kompleksowy moduł do zarządzania e-mailami oraz marketingiem mobilnym SM﻿ Dzięki modułowi SendinBlue teraz możesz łatwo i skutecznie wysyłać kampanie e-mailowe i SMS-owe do potencjalnych,
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: SendinBlue: kompleksowy moduł do zarządzania e-mailami oraz marketingiem mobilnym SM﻿ Dzięki modułowi SendinBlue teraz możesz łatwo i skutecznie wysyłać kampanie e-mailowe i SMS-owe do potencjalnych, jak i obecnych klientów.
module.additional_description: With SendinBlue, you can:Automatically synchronize your contacts on SendinBlue and pull up your salesCreate and send beautiful newslettersOptimize deliverability in inbox of your transactional mails (subscription, order confirmation, etc.)Follow results of your sendings in real timeEnjoy of a dedicated customer service, by phone or EmailSee our tutorial : https://resources.sendinblue.com/en/plugin-prestashop/

module.name: graphnvd3
module.description: This module enables the NVD3 charting code for your own uses, providing you with ever so useful graphs. It is required by other dashboard modules. NVD3 (http://nvd3
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module enables the NVD3 charting code for your own uses, providing you with ever so useful graphs. It is required by other dashboard modules. NVD3 (http://nvd3.org/) is JavaScript library that was built specifically to generate beautiful charts using D3.js (http://d3js.org/), a JavaScript library built to manipulate documents based on data.

module.description_full: Dodaje zakładkę do panelu Statystyk, zobaczysz strony odwiedzających które nie zostały odnalezione.
module.additional_description: This page tells you which pages of your catalog people have attempted to access but could not find (resulting in what is called "HTTP 404" errors). This is useful for finding potential technical problems that may hinder your sales.

module.name: nostotagging
module.displayName: Nosto - The Complete Personalization Solution for PrestaShop
module.description: Nosto harnesses big data to build a deep understanding of every customer in real-time, automatically predicting and delivering the most relevant shopping experiences wherever your customers are
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Nosto harnesses big data to build a deep understanding of every customer in real-time, automatically predicting and delivering the most relevant shopping experiences wherever your customers are.
module.additional_description: Increase customer lifetime value, average order value and conversion by personalizing the whole funnel:Acquire - Drive qualified traffic to your storeConvert - Encourage hesitant shoppers to continue to the checkoutRetain - Produce loyal customers and inspire return visits to your storeOptimize - Have full control to continually improve performance ...all the personalization tools you need in one solution. Pay only a small % of the revenue Nosto helps you generate!

module.name: 1and1hosting
module.description: At 1&1 you’ll find the perfect hosting package for your needs
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: At 1&1 you’ll find the perfect hosting package for your needs. And thanks to convenient 1-click installation, setting up PrestaShop is especially easy
module.additional_description: Further advantages you can benefit from with 1&1 New Hosting:Choose from 40 Click & Build Apps including PrestaShop1&1 Expert App Support available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week – with advice and practical help specific to the application you’re usingMaximum availability thanks to the geo-redundant hosting of your website in two geographically separate data centres1&1 SiteLock included, keeping your website virus-freeGuaranteed performance from 2 GB RAM (with the 1&1 Unlimited Plus package)Domain included free with select packages Unlimited power: Unlimited webspace, traffic, and MySQL databases

module.name: smartsupp
module.description: Smartsupp to darmowy live chat z wideo nagrywaniem odwiedzających. Klienci są teraz na Twojej stronie. Chatuj z nimi i patrz, co robią
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Smartsupp to darmowy live chat z wideo nagrywaniem odwiedzających. Klienci są teraz na Twojej stronie. Chatuj z nimi i patrz, co robią.
module.additional_description: Natychmiast odpowiadaj na pytania odwiedzającychPopraw relacje z klientamiZwiększ współczynnik konwersji (wpływ Smartsuppu na współczynnik konwersji można zmierzyć w Google Analytics)Zrozum zachowanie swoich klientów

module.name: onehopsmsservice
module.description: Sending SMS made easy on Prestashop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Sending SMS made easy on Prestashop. Whether it's sending auto confirmation messages or keeping your customers posted on the delivery status, Onehop can help you improve your Customer Interaction using SMS. Experience the magic of SMS!
module.additional_description: Feature Benefits: Merchants can easily interact with their customers via SMS. Merchants can send automated SMS alerts and notifications to their customers for: Order confirmation when an order is placed.Shipment confirmation when a product is shipped.Delivery confirmation when a product is delivered to the customer.Out of stock alerts for merchants to receive an update when a product is out of stock.Back in stock alerts for the customers when merchants update their stocks. Commercial Benefits: Discounts on purchase of a large volume of SMS credits* Service Benefits: Premium and instant support over Email, Call, Live Chat and Facebook. Free, on-call assistance with onboarding.

module.name: easywebtoapp
module.description: Create Amazing Mobile Apps for Google Play & iTunes that combine your responsive PrestaShop web store with powerful AppNotch native app features
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Create Amazing Mobile Apps for Google Play & iTunes that combine your responsive PrestaShop web store with powerful AppNotch native app features.
module.additional_description: As a PrestaShop store developer, you'll now be able to create powerful mobile apps to help your clients:      * Put Your Store on Your Customer's Phone* Make it Easy to do Business.* Be One Tap Away to Order* Keep Their People Engaged.* Get More Repeat Business.* Increase Your Site's SEO Ranking* Increase Repeat Orders with Your Store App* Boost Your Brand - Be in Google Play and iTunes.* Send Effective Push Notifications for Specials   What's great is you can help your clients grow their business while earning extra income on the exceptional work you already did. You already built a beautiful mobile friendly website for your client that gives their users a usable mobile experience. But, customers now want and expect easy, simple engagement. They want to go to their phone and tap an app icon not type a long website address to go where they want to go. They want to get timely alerts or receive push notifications letting them know of a great deal available to them. With Google now linking websites to mobile apps, you can also give your clients the easiest and most cost-effective way to boost to their SEO ranking.  Here's how it works:  * Simply drop your mobile friendly website URL into the AppNotch app.* The result is an amazing app with your all the design and functionality of your website as the UI plus a powerful app menu with app features like push notifications, message log, camera, cash register and more.* AppNotch publishes your app in the Google Play or iTunes public app stores for you or you can publish yourself using your certificates.* Your app is synchronized with your website. Anytime you update your website or app menu, your mobile app will be updated in real time with no need to republish to the app stores.* You can try your app for FREE. Preview your app on your phone by simply dropping in your URL into AppNotch and we will send you the link to Preview your app by text or email   Support -  https://addons.prestashop.com/en/contact-us?id_product=23574   Please Vote and EnjoyYour votes really make a difference! Thanks

module.name: bablic
module.description: Translate your PrestaShop store in minutes, no coding required, just use our user-friendly, visual editor
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Translate your PrestaShop store in minutes, no coding required, just use our user-friendly, visual editor. Choose from machine-translation, manual translation (do it yourself) or order professional human translation with just a click!
module.additional_description: Reach new customers globally in a matter of minutes & increase salesManually edit translations, replace images, fix style issues with just a click in our visual editorImmediately compete with the big guys using your fully localized PrestaShop store

module.name: wirecardceecheckoutseamless
module.description: Integrate all the payment methods you need into your online shop quickly and without any red tape
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Integrate all the payment methods you need into your online shop quickly and without any red tape.
module.additional_description: As a merchant based in Europe, offer your customers all over the world the opportunity to pay securely and conveniently at your online shop.  All standard payment methods (card payment, alternative methods incl. purchase on account with payment guarantee)Simple integrationAdditional premium servicesComprehensive support (via email, live chat, telephone)For merchants of all sizes and across all industriesIncluding fraud preventionPersonal merchant loginDetailed reportingOne interface for all payment methodsSolutions for your point of sale (POS, mPOS9)All the benefits of Wirecard AG (risk management, full banking licence, PCI certification)

module.name: salesmanago
module.description: Numer jeden na świecie wśród platform automatyzacji marketingu, w kategorii eCommerce, używana przez ponad 6 tysięcy firm. Testuj za darmo z profesjonalnym wsparciem
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Numer jeden na świecie wśród platform automatyzacji marketingu, w kategorii eCommerce, używana przez ponad 6 tysięcy firm. Testuj za darmo z profesjonalnym wsparciem.
module.additional_description: SALESmanago Marketing Automation dla e-commerce Co SalesManago oferuje Twojemu sklepowi? ● Monitoruj, co użytkownicy robią na stronie, konwertuj wyświetlenia strony na sprzedaż.● Automatycznie segmentuj bazę użytkowników w oparciu o zachowanie na stronie.● Automatyczne tworzenie i wysyłanie spersonalizowanych treści do klientów.● Uruchom czat sprzedażowy przy użyciu botów. SALESmanago to działająca w chmurze platforma do Automatyzacji Marketingu używana przez ponad 6,000 firm z całego świata, głównie z sektora B2C i sklepy internetowe. Korzystając z potęgi analizy zachowań użytkowników na stronie internetowej lub aplikacji, SALESmanago pozwala na pełne spersonalizowanie E-mail marketingu, dynamicznych treści na stronie i kampanii w mediach społecznościowych. - Cena licencji zaczyna się od 0zł miesięcznie, wsparcie przy wdrożeniu jest w cenie. - Nielimitowane kampanie i wiadomości mailowe.- Nieograniczona ilość kont użytkowników i reguł automatyzacji. - Brak ryzyka - umowa na czas nieokreślony z jednomiesięcznym okresem wypowiedzenia. - Darmowe webinary i materiały szkoleniowe dla użytkowników.

module.name: ps_emailsmanager
module.description: Adapt your emails’ design to your site’s visual identity, to your business, or to the time of the year with the native Email Template Manager module, available by default in your store&rsq
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adapt your emails’ design to your site’s visual identity, to your business, or to the time of the year with the native Email Template Manager module, available by default in your store’s back office! This free module allows you to easily modify the template of your transactional emails, such as the registration confirmation or order confirmation, without hiring a designer.
module.additional_description: This email template installation and management module allows you to interchange and modify your different templates and save your configurations. Depending on the design and level of customization that the developer has allowed, your templates can be customized and allow you to:   modify the emails’ main and secondary colorschoose the text's fontadd links to your social networks and modify their logosinsert images and additional text This tool also allows you to save your transactional emails and the default PrestaShop design. Finally, you don't have to write or translate your emails’ content: the template automatically retrieves the default translations available for the transactional email in PrestaShop!

module.name: worldcoo
module.displayName: Donation Widget | Collaborate with recognized NGOs
module.description: Foster loyalty among your clients and improve your brand image by offering a chance to support recognisable NGOs at no cost
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Foster loyalty among your clients and improve your brand image by offering a chance to support recognisable NGOs at no cost.
module.additional_description: Increase the conversion ratio of your e-commerce site:According to BBMG, more than two million [U1] consumers are redefining their purchasing habits and opting for responsible consumption.Improve your brand image and distinguish yourself from the competition: It has been confirmed that when companies show support for social causes, 93% of the public has a more positive image of the company.Promote loyalty among your users:Take advantage of the opportunity to show your social values. Collaborating in the financing of social projects will help you consolidate the connection with your clients, creating a dialogue and relationship.Take part in social change: Have you asked yourself how many transactions occur during one day? What would happen if we donated one euro with each transaction? Now, you and your clients have the opportunity to create social impact, quickly, easily and without cost.

module.name: cloudswipe
module.description: 150+ payment gateways included for free! Securely collect payments with Authorize.net, PayPal, Stripe, etc. on a PCI compliant page that looks exactly like your website
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: 150+ payment gateways included for free! Securely collect payments with Authorize.net, PayPal, Stripe, etc. on a PCI compliant page that looks exactly like your website.
module.additional_description: Security: The most secure way to collect payments onlineSimplicity: The easiest way to make your site PCI compliant.Savings: No need to buy other payment gateway add-ons. 150+ gateways included for free. No SSL required. CloudSwipe skins your hosted payment page with your PrestaShop theme so it looks exactly like the rest of your website. The most customizable, easiest to use, hosted payment page ever. You get:All the security for PCI compliant paymentsA secure payment page that looks exactly like the rest of your websiteSupport for over 150 payment gatewaysHappy customers confident in your securityPeace of mind You do NOT need:To buy a payment gateway module (150+ gateways are already integrated)Your own SSL certificate (payments are secured with SSL)To worry about security (we handle it for you)

module.name: cleverreach
module.displayName: CleverReach® - Newsletter Marketing for your PrestaShop
module.description: Spotify, Levi’s, DHL and BMW create & send their newsletters with CleverReach®. Why? – It’s email marketing made easier
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Spotify, Levi’s, DHL and BMW create & send their newsletters with CleverReach®. Why? – It’s email marketing made easier. Benefit from our efficient software & flexible pricing without a contract term – with your PrestaShop.
module.additional_description: The module directly connects our CleverReach® Email Marketing tool with your PrestaShop. All your important „PrestaShop data“ will instantly and automatically be updated and completed in the CleverReach® newsletter tool. The synchronization saves you time and trouble. At the same time, you avoid errors that often occur during a manual import and export. Synchronized PrestaShop data: Newsletter subscriptions and unsubscribesFirst and last name, interests, gender, age, birthday, address details … purchased items, revenue, frequency of purchases, average shopping cart, order number, item number, product name, price, currency, quantity, amount product details of your PrestaShop products like image, text, price, size, material … It’s as simple as that! Use valuable data to create personal offers your customers really want. Your benefits: more opens, more clicks and more conversions! This is the key to increasing sales: your customers buy more and more frequently – Profit. Profit. Profit. Click on the top right „Download “-button now to download the module and install it in the PrestaShop backend without any great effort. Afterwards, quickly and easily connect your PrestaShop with CleverReach®, synchronize your shop data and create and send your first email. CleverReach® is the provider for email marketing for more than 160,000 customers, e.g. Spotify, Levi’s, Playboy, DHL and Amnesty International, in 152 countries. CleverReach® was founded in 2007 in Germany and complies with the highest standards of data protection. Exclusively for PrestaShop customers:Get a 10% discount off your CleverReach® rate for 12 months! Email marketing made easier: discount will automatically provided when creating a new account

module.name: recolize
module.description: Personalizacja jest nieodzownym elementem każdego PrestaShopu. Maksimum zysków, minimum wysiłku
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Personalizacja jest nieodzownym elementem każdego PrestaShopu. Maksimum zysków, minimum wysiłku. Dziecinnie proste dzięki Recolize! Korzystaj bezpłatnie – nie potrzeba karty kredytowej.
module.additional_description: Czy wiesz, że większość odwiedzających Twój sklep opuszcza go bez żadnej interakcji?Zoptymalizuj ruch na stronie dzięki w pełni zautomatyzowanym spersonalizowanym rekomendacjom produktów i zaciekaw swoich klientów odpowiednimi produktami we właściwym czasie. Twoi klienci podziękują Ci poprzez nawet czterokrotnie większy współczynnik konwersjidodatkowy dochód na poziomie nawet do 20%.zwiększenie średniej wartości zamówienia Rozpocznij już teraz bezpłatne korzystanie z rozwiązania „plug & play” Recolize.Opłaty uzależnione od sukcesu – po tysiącu bezpłatnych kliknięć rekomendacji na miesiąc płacisz jedynie 0,039€ za kliknięcie.
